column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I took a bus to the train station and then walked into the big , brick building .
#text=There 's a bank of windows at the far side of the building .
#text=I went over to one of them and asked for a one way ticket to New York City .
#text=I paid for the ticket with my credit card and then went to sit on the hard wooden booths in the middle of the station .
#text=I looked up at the huge arrival screen at the front of the station .
#text=My train was listed there with a number of others .
#text=It said the train was on time and would arrive at the station soon .
#text=When it came in , there was an announcement that the train to New York was boarding .
#text=I got up and walked with about thirty other travelers down some stairs and along a long hallway , then up another flight of stairs and out onto a platform .
#text=The train was there next to the platform with its doors open .
#text=I walked into the train and took a seat by the window so I could watch things go by as we traveled .
#text=Soon the train started moving along the tracks .
#text=After a while the train 's conductor walked down the aisles saying , Tickets please .
#text=I handed him my ticket and he punched a hole in it and put a ticket stub in the back of the seat in front of me .
#text=When the train got to New York City I got off the train and walked out onto one of the platforms at Grand Central Station .
